If \\( \\theta(x, t) \\) is introduced into the flow at t = 0 and allowed to evolve under the Navier-Stokes equations governed by \\( \\mathbf{u}(x, t) \\) without further intervention, will the temperature profile at t = T be the same as if \\( \\theta(x, t = 0) \\) was evolved without the flow field \\( \\mathbf{u}(x, t) \\)?
